casebody.data:
Cicchella, Appellee, v. Administrator, Ohio Bureau of Employment Services, Appellant, et al.

[Cite as Cicchella v. Bur. of Employment Services (1985), 19 Ohio St. 3d 152.]

(No. 85-15 Decided October 9, 1985.) Mancino, Mancino & Mancino and Paul Mancino, Jr., for appellee. Anthony J. Celebrezze, Jr., attorney general, Patrick A. Devine and Fred J. Pompeani, for appellant.

This cause on appeal from the court of appeals (case No. 48085) is reversed on authority of Gleason v. Bur. of Employment Services (1985), 17 Ohio St. 3d 107.

Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, C. Brown and Wright, JJ., concur. Celebrezze, C.J., and Douglas,,J., dissent. Celebrezze, C.J!,

dissenting'. I dissent for the reasons stated in my dissenting opinion in Gleason v. Bur. of Employment Services (1985), 17 Ohio St. 3d 107, 111-112.
